page.title: 10Trade - Mattingley Area.
page.content: {There are no shops in the block.}For everyday items residents travel to Hook, Hartley Wintney, Fleet or Yateley. Some go to the village shop at Rotherwick which is also the nearest Post Office. For larger items they have to go to Basingstoke, Fleet, Reading or elsewhere. Most of the trade within the block is done in the two public houses,{'The Leather {Bottle'}at Mattingley &{'The Old Mill {Inn'}at Dipley - the former is particularly popular at weekends. Eggs, fruit & other{farm produce}is sold in season. On the edge of Hazeley Heath is{Wedgewood Farm Licensed {Boarding Kennels}which has been in business since 1982. They usually have about 30 dogs staying for anything up to several months if their owners have gone abroad.
